vote.title: Authorize a five-year service contract, with two one-year renewal options, for financial advisory services for the City Controller’s Office - Hilltop Securities, Inc. in the amount of $300,000 and Estrada Hinojosa & Company, Inc. in the amount of $200,000, proposed jointly; most advantageous proposer of six - Not to exceed $500,000 - Financing: Financial advisory fees to be paid from bond proceeds and Dallas Water Utilities Fund, contingent upon completion of each bond sale; fees for advisory services not related to bond issuance to be paid from General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize a five-year service contract, with two one-year renewal options, for financial advisory services for the City Controller’s Office - Hilltop Securities, Inc. in the amount of $300,000 and Estrada Hinojosa & Company, Inc. in the amount of $200,000, proposed jointly; most advantageous proposer of six - Not to exceed $500,000 - Financing: Financial advisory fees to be paid from bond proceeds and Dallas Water Utilities Fund, contingent upon completion of each bond sale; fees for advisory services not related to bond issuance to be paid from General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
